briefTitle: Study for the Multidimensional Analyses of Resistance and Toxicity to Immune- and Targeted-therapies.
officialTitle: POSITive: Prospective Observational Study for the Multidimensional Analyses of Resistance and Toxicity to Immune- and Targeted-therapies
conditions: Breast Cancer, Lung Cancer, Melanoma, Head and Neck Cancer, Urothelial Carcinoma, Colorectal Cancer, Liver Metastases, Lung Metastases
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Percentage of patients in each cohort that will obtain a full "core" omic characterization.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* age\>18 yrs old
* histological diagnosis of any cancer
* signed informed consent
* fulfills criteria described in cohort definition
* Clinical indication for a diagnostic biopsy

Exclusion Criteria:

Performance Status (ECOG) \>2

* life expectancy \< 3 months
* unwilling to receive treatment at IEO for at least 6 months after enrolment
* active pregnancy at the moment of enrolment
* for cohort F: use of steroids (higher than 10 mg prednisone-equivalent) or other major immunosuppressive drug (e.g. tocilizumab) in the 14 days prior to the baseline sample collection.
